values.text:
Welcome to your 94729873749632 AskHR Virtual Agent.  I’m ready to help!

I can help you answer a wide variety of HR-related at 94729873749632 such as questions or initiate a series of HR transactions. I am always learning and if I am not able to answer your question, I will help you find the support you need (create a support ticket/connect to a live chat agent).
Short questions in English with a single topic and keywords work best.
